content: this crochet washcloth pattern is really easy and it uses the spider stitch this stitch uses beginner crochet stitches and you simply need to know how to single_crochet and make a chain stitch with these crocheted dish rags you can make them any size that you d like as long as you keep an even stitch count my finished wash rags are about 9″ inches by 9″ inches square which is a generous size but you can make them even bigger and better if you d like the stitch pattern is so easy that even new crocheters shouldn t have any trouble
